pageContext.claim: “We are so far ahead of China, you wouldn't believe. We picked up trillions and trillions of dollars in worth and China has gone down many trillions of dollars in worth.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump keeps pointing the stock market valuations to claim his trade war is having an impact. But analysts say the stock decline in China -- which ended at the start of 2019 -- was the result of domestic factors unrelated to the trade war. Meanwhile, U.S. stocks have been whipsawed by the trade talks and by the impact the trade war is having on manufacturing.
